description_html: The Corona Ceiling Mount fixture [RC 59] from CL Sterling is composed of nuggets of recycled lead crystal that have been tumbled to remove sharp edges and then individually handtied to a nickel plated brass frame using jeweler’s wire. 5.9”H x 13.8” Dia. A variety of glass diffuser options are offered. Accepts (2) 60W incandescent bulbs or equivalent. Approximately 20 lbs.
